aspguidc.service.compilation

Class SourceCodeCompilationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidc.service.compilation.SourceCodeCompilationService

  • public class SourceCodeCompilationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class which provides methods regarding to compiling java source code to an executable jar file. An instance of this class is assigned to a single directory containing the source code which is compiled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourceCodeCompilationService(java.io.File sourceCodeDirectory)
      Create a new compilation service instance for the given source code directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File buildJarFile(java.io.File targetDirectory, java.lang.String targetFileName)
      Compile the source code inside the directory which is assigned to the service instance into an executable jar file with the given name and move the jar file into the given target directory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourceCodeCompilationService

        public SourceCodeCompilationService(java.io.File sourceCodeDirectory)
        Create a new compilation service instance for the given source code directory.

        The given source code directory must contain a valid ant build file with a target named "jar", which generates a jar file in the root of the directory.

        Parameters:
        sourceCodeDirectory - directory containing the source code which is processed by the service

    • Method Detail

      • buildJarFile

        public java.io.File buildJarFile(java.io.File targetDirectory,
                                 java.lang.String targetFileName)
                          throws java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException,
                                 CompilationFailedException
        Compile the source code inside the directory which is assigned to the service instance into an executable jar file with the given name and move the jar file into the given target directory.

        The given jar name must match the name of the jar file which is generated by the "jar" target of the ant build file contained in the directory which is assigend to the service instance.

        Parameters:
        targetDirectory - directory to which the compiled jar file is moved
        targetFileName - name of the compiled jar file
        Returns:
        compiled executable jar file
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.FileAlreadyExistsException - if the file with the given file name in the given target directory already exists
        CompilationFailedException - if the compilation of the source code fails
